levels.description: Rushes forward 2 tiles, slashing all surrounding enemies for <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK for every step moved; every enemy attacked in the process <@ba.vup>extends</> distance of the rush (max. 5 tiles, <@ba.vup>can hit aerial units</>)
